output.sentences: This weekend, I took a weekend trip home to visit my parents.
I grew up in this house, and I loved sitting on the couch and really enjoyed the view.
My mom loves to read, so there is a huge bookcase to hold all of her books.
My dad likes to watch the game, so he has a TV in his man cave.
Since my mom works from home, she has a little office she likes to keep neat and clean.
